data.name: Blackberry the Witch: Journey Demo
data.detailed_description:
Embark on an adventure with the young witch Blackberry!

Blackberry the Witch Journey is a game about friendship, betrayal and explosive magic, of course! Down with gray and dull everyday life! You will be transported to the «Thorns Boarding School» - a school for special children-sorcerers.
Blackberry is a young witch resigned to her fate, whose dark and mysterious past has locked her within the walls of the orphanage. But she is ready to do anything to save her best friend Raspberrу, who is associated with a dark cult.
Fix the pipeline? Sure! Unite with the sworn enemy? Only is necessary…
You will become her conscience and overcome all adventures with Blackberry.

Demo version contains only 1st chapter of original game.

Key features

  • Classic 2d adventure
  • Original story
  • Challanging puzzles
  • Handdrawn 2d graphics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
